attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Default text which appears in the textarea

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of the input field, as per native input

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Adds a custom icon glyph to the input field, using icons found in strand-icon.

attributes.name: clear
attributes.description: Display a clear button when text is input.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Native - width of the textarea in pixels.

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.description: Native - Maximum number of characters allowed in the field.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: Make the input read-only, keeping it active but preventing the user from changing its value

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Used to display a visual error state, can be set via validation or directly.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: instructs the component to be displayed at a predetermined size (i.e. - 'normal' or 'large')

detail.name: value
detail.description: The updated value of the text input.
